Reviews.Title: “YOU CAN PAY MORE BUT CAN'T BEAT THIS HOTEL'S AMBIANCE, CHARM & FAMILY-OWNED HOSPITALITY! A MUST-DO IN BRANSON!”
Reviews.Author: sally m
Reviews.Content: Thanks to Dan & Sandy for making our family reunion such a sweet success. This family-owned hotel is like staying at a good friend's home. The rooms are clean, pool is well-maintained and the owners and staff are just wonderful people. Dan's advise was critical and 'right-on' for our show choices and dining experiences while we celebrated being with our family members from around the country. A charming, clean and safe place to stay! We will be back next year for our 2nd family reunion in Branson. We LOVED this place!! I give THE GREEN MOUNTAIN INN in Branson, Mo. 5 shining stars! Try it, you'll like it too!! See y'all soon. Thanks for everything. Best regards, Sally Appleby Miller

Reviews.Title: “Simple but does the trick”
Reviews.Author: LindenBJ
Reviews.Content: If you need a quick, cheap place to stop for the night, this is it. We didn't want to travel home in the dark & found this hotel had good ratings on Tripadvisor. So we took the chance. The A/C works. It has hot water. Water pressure is normal. There is absolutely nothing fancy about this place. This is a Mom & Pop hotel; meaning you get one sheet on the bed & the bedspread is also your blanket. If you need more bedding there is more in the closet. There are waffles, fruit, cereal, etc for breakfast but we woke up too late to experience that. There is a pool in the middle courtyard, which I must say I like that better than being right next to the road. They do offer smoking & non smoking rooms, I was worried I'd smell smoke in my room, but I didn't. They do not want pets, but if you have one, I think they make you pay a deposit up front. Again, I wasn't thrilled staying in a place with pets, but I was desparate to get off my feet. This worked for that.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience!”
Reviews.Author: lucymayze08
Reviews.Content: Had a wonderful experience. The room was very clean and comfortable. Sandy and Dan are soooo nice and accomodating. The waffles every morning are fantastic. Wouldn't stay any place else when in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: Cathy K
Reviews.Content: If you want a quiet, clean, afforable & very friendly place for your vacation in Branson - please check out this great place. The owners will do anything to help make your stay plesant.

Reviews.Title: “Nice family owners but hotel needs upgrading”
Reviews.Author: Oklahomamimi5
Reviews.Content: Older hotel that lacks counter space in the sink area and needs more places to put items in the shower area. Lights were out at the curvy steep entrance making it dangerous. Room was stale upon arrival. Carpet is old and worn. Sheets were very thin. Free breakfast was adequate. Family owners were nice. Location was good for staying away from the busy main strip. Hotel is overpriced for condition.

Reviews.Title: “Room OK, but exterior needs help”
Reviews.Author: rlminnick
Reviews.Content: Made this reservation online.... Room was clean and sufficient space. We didn't try the breakfast area. This is an older site, the rooms have been kept up, but we stayed on the second floor (exterior entrance) and wooden walkway was in bad repair. Still, all in all, we got what we paid for.

Reviews.Title: “Friendliest hotel in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: Julia_Gulia90
Reviews.Content: In my 20 years, we've taken at Branson vacation at least once almost every single year. We have stayed at various hotels and even though they were nice, the hotel staff was always rude. At Green Mountain Inn, this does not apply. The staff was wonderful from the moment we booked our room. My dad has Parkinson's and cannot get up and down stairs well. The staff were nice enough to make sure we got a first floor room. When we let them know we probably wouldn't be getting into town until late, they were very accommodating. They even called us on our way down there to make sure everything was okay and find out if we'd still make it down that night. The room was VERY clean. You could eat off the floor! We were very pleased. Dad enjoyed the easy chair, he spent a lot of time reading there while the girls went shopping. The pool area was clean and well maintained. The breakfast was great! We loved Sandy's waffles and were stuffed when we set out for our vacation adventures. We also got to enjoy the company of the owners, who chatted with us and other guests during breakfast. The location of the hotel was perfect. Close enough to all of the "action" but far enough away to enjoy peace and quiet. We really enjoyed our time at Green Mountain Inn and plan to come back SOON!

Reviews.Title: “Tried and True, consistently pleasant...”
Reviews.Author: forgefan
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Green Mountain again. B-fast was good as always. Had to deal with a troop of Girls Scounts Saturday morning at b-fast - they were not very pleasant - and their parents were very loud Saturday night - husband had to finally say something to them at 11:30 p.m. - but that is not fault of Dan and Sandy's. Room was nice and we had to spend quite a bit of time in there as it was so hot. We aren't swimmers, so do not sit by or use the pool. But all in all yet again, the Green Mountain Inn was a very wonderful experience and we will stay there again next time we are in town.

Reviews.Title: “5 Star Cleanliness, Convenience and Cordiality”
Reviews.Author: TripmomLedgewood_NJ
Reviews.Content: From the moment I called to make our reservation until the moment we left after our four night stay, I was made to feel that my family's enjoyment was the owners' top priority and that no request was too much trouble. We found our room to be extremely clean, reasonably priced, and comfortable; additionally, everything that was supposed to work (air-conditioning, TV, WIFI) was functioning properly. The pool area was well-maintained and our children used it several times. Included in the price of the room is breakfast that features homemade waffles and fresh donuts as well as other selections. This is a "Mom and Pop" business that definitely reflects pride of ownership. We were very impressed and would certainly recommend Green Mountain Inn to others.

Reviews.Title: “all around great deal”
Reviews.Author: tntraveler067
Reviews.Content: my siblings and I met here from 3 states to surprise our mother for her 80th birthday--the price and location were perfect but the friendliness and helpfulness of these owners was off the chart! Not only did Sandy assist us with show tickets, when the donuts were gone from the continental breakfast she went and got more!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for your dollar~Clean friendly and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: Tracey1223
Reviews.Content: Went down for one night stay to see a show and hit all the antique malls. Stayed at the Green Mountain Inn and it was great. The owners are friendly. It is family owned. The room was clean & comfortable. This is not a five star or anything like that just a quiet motel in a very good location. The rooms are older so they are smaller. Kept extremely clean and yes they are a little worn from scrubing the floor the pattern has come off of the linoleum. Bathrooms are smaller but it served the purpose for us. Just a place to sleep and dress. The breakfast was adequate just your basics cereal, toast, donuts, juice milk and coffee. Enough to tide you over till lunch and to save a few bucks on breakfast. There was to much to do to be sitting in a room. In the summer the pool looks like it would be a lot of fun. The outside was well maintained.

Reviews.Title: “Felt like home!”
Reviews.Author: otis21
Reviews.Content: I have small children and sometimes when we travel, it is hard to remember everything we need. Right when we got to Green Mountain Inn I realized I had no where for my 9 month old to sleep. "Not a problem!", we are told, "we have one you can borrow. And if they are all in use, we will go get you another!". Wow! Really? The couple that runs Green Mountain Inn are the best. Sandy and Dan Flanders are their name. Another couple came in while we were there, and Sandy remembered them from last year. It was a guesture that will keep us staying only at their hotel. On top of everything else, the room was fantastic. Super clean, smelled great, and we even got extra towels and pillows with a smile! We will not look for anywhere else to stay! They have our business for good!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay - great room at a reasonable price.”
Reviews.Author: lucymayze
Reviews.Content: The room was great. Dan and Sandy Flanders were wonderful hosts and gave us tips on shows to see as well as delicious places to eat. We will make this our place of choice to stay in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Don't stay here.”
Reviews.Author: Surprised09
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel. It is dirty. The sheets were so thin I thought I was sleeping on the nasty mattress. Wash clothes had holes. I tried to close my mind to my surroundings. We stayed here because all the hotels we checked on were booked.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly people with poor cleaning and maintenance skills.”
Reviews.Author: Hazel4616
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly, but the interior of the motel smelled musty, the bed linens were old, stained, and did not look freshly laundered. The mirrors were dusty and/or smirred. The exterior looked inviting, but, other than fresh towels, nothing appeared very clean inside. We dropped our luggage to head out for a show & didn't really get a good look until late the first evening. No one checked on or made up either of the two rooms we had during our two night stay. Both couples had a similar experience. The location is fine!! I left a letter voicing my concerns, and hopefully they will take heed and get back to the service indicated in the 2008 reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Super clean; great service; very nice owners”
Reviews.Author: RLCgirl
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed 2 nights at the Green Mountain Inn in November and thoroughly enjoyed it. The owners were more than accommodating -- giving recommendations for wonderful places to eat -- making our anniversary dinner very special. The room was extra clean. Wish we could have stayed longer!

Reviews.Title: “nice surprise”
Reviews.Author: billculler
Reviews.Content: We got to Branson a day early and were looking for our hotel to see if we could check in early. We got confused and ended up at the Green Mtn Inn by mistake but they were so nice and accommodating that we stayed there. The room was clean and very comfortable. The only criticism I have it that they push show tickets offered by a third party. We shopped around however and got show tickets quite a bit cheaper. I suspect that the hotel gets a kickback and that is why they push buying show tickets from this one broker.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay”
Reviews.Author: mmichael171
Reviews.Content: The property and people here are great. Spent five nights in a two room suite at an outstanding price in November. One negative was that the baby crib wouldn't fit in our room, but I am pleased to say that this problem was cured by the very cordial staff at the Green Mountain Inn. This place is definately on my list to stay again. The continental breakfast is good and had a good selection. One of the best non-chain motels I have stayed at for some time.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Motel, Friendly People”
Reviews.Author: jwoge
Reviews.Content: We just got back from 4 nights in Branson at the Green Mt Inn. This is a two-story, family run motel with the basic amenities: pool and continental breakfast. We enjoyed spending time with "King George" and the puppies while we visited the lobby for a chat. The folks running the place are very friendly and helpful and gave us some great suggestions for shows, restaurants and shopping. There are no hairdryers in the room but they do provide them if you ask (along with iron/ironing board). We had a problem with the a/c in our room and they immediately moved us to the room next door. The only thing I would have liked was a fridge in the room but I can survive without for a few days. The pool is open 24 hours which can be both good and bad depending on your perspective. For $44.00 per night I would return again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Cheap Accomodations!”
Reviews.Author: SunBum09
Reviews.Content: Green Mountain Inn is a nice, comfortable place to stay in Branson. I travel to Branson 1-2 times a year and never make reservations beforehand because there are so many places to stay- you could never have trouble finding vacancies. Typically, we choose a motel based on the advertising on the sign. This motel cost us only $85 for 2 nights (would have been even better deal for 3 nights). The innkeepers are very hospitable and really aim to please. Continental breakfast is included. We did not get a chance to use the pool, since we had so much outlet shopping to accomplish, but it looked nice. The rooms were clean and comfortable. It was just my friend and I traveling (2 girls, mid 20-s) and pretty much like anywhere in Branson, we felt safe. There is so much to do in Branson, why waste all your $ on the room? We were really in it only to sleep. P.S. Make sure you check out Branson Landing at night! Cantina Laredo is an excellent place to dine and is reasonable for the awesome atmosphere and cuisine you get!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent experience - Great price”
Reviews.Author: I_travel_places
Reviews.Content: Great value. Great experience. Even better than we expected. My family and I stayed at the Green Mountain Inn and had a wonderful time. The hotel is managed by the owners and they went out of their way to make our stay comfortable. For example, we knew we wouldn't arrive until very late, so we called ahead to let them know, and they were very accommodating. They also work with a local discount ticket sales company so that guests at the hotel can order discount tickets for events and they are quickly delivered to the front desk. Every day they had a complimentary continental breakfast available. Choices included doughnuts, oatmeal, cereal, milk, hot waffles (make it yourself), fruit and coffee. The rooms are clean and quiet. Furnishings are standard for a budget hotel. They have an outdoor pool, but it was too early in the season to be open. Location is great. You have easy access to Branson attractions since the Green Mountain Inn is on one of Branson's alternate routes (which helps tremendously when traffic is bad because you don't have to drive on the main strip). My whole family agrees that we had an excellent experience at Green Mountain Inn and will definitely stay here again the next time we come to Branson.

HotelInfo.Name: Green Mountain Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2825 Green Mountain Dr, Branson, MO 65616
